content:
I'm trying to implement https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-shorthand/sushi.html#new-ig-publisher-integration-autobuild-configuration and the associated autobuild https://github.com/FHIR/auto-ig-builder/blob/master/README.md functionality for the Plan-Net IG. https://github.com/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net

I don't think I have appropriate privileges. Who needs to anoint me with the appropriate oil? Alternatively, can someone set up this repo for autobuild?

Thanks,
Saul

@Lloyd McKenzie

Hi @Saul Kravitz I responded to your emails twice indicating that it was already done - perhaps emails from me are getting routed to spam or something? (I set up the hook at the same time I created the repository.) We generally don't give out admin privileges to repositories because everyone new who needs to commit needs to come through a specific process to ensure they've agreed to the appropriate agreements and we don't want to delegate that responsibility out too far.

Sorry/thanks....I'll relook in my spam. It was certainly exceptional that I didn't hear from you, since you are SUPER responsive. Sorry for the aggravation.

Indeed flagged as SPAM. Our spam filtering is incredibly poor, but usually it errs on the side of letting spam through, rather than filing real mail as SPAM.

Lloyd McKenzie said:

Perhaps I'm too prolific ;)

or something like that...
